html: Since I was at the refugees' #rohingya camps in Bangladesh with @unicef_es, the word refugee means much more for me. html: Rohingya refugee children have lost everything. We can’t give up on them. There are solutions to protect the future of #ChildrenUprooted from their homes. Learn more about @UNICEF’s work and how you can help → http://uni.cf/Rohingya  #ChidrenUnderAttackpic.twitter.com/fIarzz5gdU
text:
Rohingya refugee children have lost everything. We can’t give up on them. There are solutions to protect the future of #ChildrenUprooted from their homes. 
Learn more about @UNICEF’s work and how you can help → http://uni.cf/Rohingya  #ChidrenUnderAttackpic.twitter.com/fIarzz5gdU

html: 1 in 4 #rohingya children have malnutrition. In centers like this one, the little ones are brought back to full-health thanks to the work of @unicef. #childrenuprootedpic.twitter.com/DjlenHwMgk
text: 1 in 4 #rohingya children have malnutrition. In centers like this one, the little ones are brought back to full-health thanks to the work of @unicef. #childrenuprootedpic.twitter.com/DjlenHwMgk

text: 1 de cada 4 niños #rohingyas tiene desnutrición. En centros como este, los pequeños se curan gracias al trabajo de @unicef_es #conUNICEFenBangladeshpic.twitter.com/5rESQa04rB

html: Thousands of #rohingya children face hurricanes and monsoons, which can leave flooded camps, devastated homes, disease outbreaks... Let’s support @unicef so that we can continue to help these children! #childrenuprooted http://bit.ly/conUNICEFenBangladesh …pic.twitter.com/bLVgpwjvYP
text:
Thousands of #rohingya children face hurricanes and monsoons, which can leave flooded camps, devastated homes, disease outbreaks... 
Let’s support @unicef so that we can continue to help these children! #childrenuprooted 
http://bit.ly/conUNICEFenBangladesh …pic.twitter.com/bLVgpwjvYP

html: Miles de niños #rohingya se enfrentan a los huracanes y el monzón, que pueden dejar campamentos inundados, viviendas arrasadas, brotes de enfermedades… ¡Apoyemos a @unicef_es para que pueda seguir ayudando a los niños! #conUNICEFenBangladesh http://bit.ly/conUNICEFenBangladesh …pic.twitter.com/8mVAEB9vZ7
text:
Miles de niños #rohingya se enfrentan a los huracanes y el monzón, que pueden dejar campamentos inundados, viviendas arrasadas, brotes de enfermedades… ¡Apoyemos a @unicef_es para que pueda seguir ayudando a los niños! #conUNICEFenBangladesh
http://bit.ly/conUNICEFenBangladesh …pic.twitter.com/8mVAEB9vZ7

html: He estado con los niños #rohingyas y sus familias, conociendo sus historias de drama y superación, y el trabajo de @unicef_es para que sobrevivan al presente y tengan un futuro. ¡Mandadme vuestras preguntas! #conUNICEFenBangladeshpic.twitter.com/aLFw5sbLxo
text: He estado con los niños #rohingyas y sus familias, conociendo sus historias de drama y superación, y el trabajo de @unicef_es para que sobrevivan al presente y tengan un futuro. ¡Mandadme vuestras preguntas! #conUNICEFenBangladeshpic.twitter.com/aLFw5sbLxo

html: I have been spending time with the #rohingya children and their families, hearing their stories of drama and perseverance through the work of @unicef, which helps them survive their present and have a future. Send me your questions! #childrenuprooted (10.15am GMT+2)pic.twitter.com/2Tau519e1B
text:
I have been spending time with the #rohingya children and their families, hearing their stories of drama and perseverance through the work of @unicef, which helps them survive their present and have a future. 
Send me your questions! #childrenuprooted (10.15am GMT+2)pic.twitter.com/2Tau519e1B

html: It’s incredible what @unicef does with #rohingyas children who have witnessed unimaginable experiences. In spaces with their friends, like this, children channel their traumas, anger, and deep pain through art and play. #childrenuprootedpic.twitter.com/vySXcOjXOX
text: It’s incredible what @unicef does with #rohingyas children who have witnessed unimaginable experiences. In spaces with their friends, like this, children channel their traumas, anger, and deep pain through art and play. #childrenuprootedpic.twitter.com/vySXcOjXOX

html: Increíble lo que @unicef_es consigue con niños #rohingyas que han sido testigos de experiencias inimaginables. En espacios amigos de la infancia como este, los niños canalizan sus traumas, su rabia y su profundo dolor a través del arte y el juego. #conUNICEFenBangladeshpic.twitter.com/muNcZ1upcj
text: Increíble lo que @unicef_es consigue con niños #rohingyas que han sido testigos de experiencias inimaginables. html: I'm with @UNICEF in Bangladesh, in Cox's Bazar, the city that houses the largest refugee camp in the world. More than 700,000 children and their families have passed through here from the #rohingya community during the last year. #childrenuprootedpic.twitter.com/tHnI26uDFk
text: I'm with @UNICEF in Bangladesh, in Cox's Bazar, the city that houses the largest refugee camp in the world. More than 700,000 children and their families have passed through here from the #rohingya community during the last year. #childrenuprootedpic.twitter.com/tHnI26uDFk

html: Estoy con @unicef_es en Bangladesh, en Cox’s Bazar, la ciudad con el campamento de refugiados más grande del mundo.
